Specimen Type: Whole blood, serum, plasma, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), tissue biopsy
Purpose: To accurately and reliably detect Human Herpes Virus-6 DNA in clinical specimens using real-time PCR.
Container: EDTA tube for whole blood; appropriate sterile container for serum, plasma, CSF or tissue biopsy
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500 or Bio-Rad CFX96), DNA extraction kit, spectrophotometer
